sqlMap.select: SELECT MAX(APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD) AS A FROM HP1D001T_TZ WHERE 1=1 AND PID = #PID# AND DCP_TYPE = 'A'
SELECT MAX(APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD) AS P FROM HP1D001T_TZ WHERE 1=1 AND PID = #PID# AND DCP_TYPE = 'P'
SELECT MAX(APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD) AS T FROM HP1D001T_TZ WHERE 1=1 AND PID = #PID# AND DCP_TYPE = 'T'
SELECT MAX(APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD) AS M FROM HP1D001T_TZ WHERE 1=1 AND PID = #PID# AND DCP_TYPE = 'M'
SELECT MAX(APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD) AS E FROM HP1D001T_TZ WHERE 1=1 AND PID = #PID# AND DCP_TYPE = 'E'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM HP1DM01T WHERE 1=1 AND PID NOT IN (SELECT SUB_PID FROM HP1DM02T)
AND PID=#PID#

SELECT A.PID, B.SUB_PID, (SELECT APPLICATION FROM HP1DM01T WHERE PID= B.SUB_PID) AS APPLICATION, A.RD_THEME, A.OWNER_ORG_CD, A.REGIST_ORG_CD FROM HP1DM02T B, HP1DM01T A WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.PID = A.PID AND A.PID = #PID#

SELECT PID, RD_CATEGORY_TYPE, F_GET_COMBO_NAME('STATUS_CD', PID_STATUS_CD) AS PID_STATUS_NM, F_GET_COMBO_NAME('CATEGORY_CD', RD_CATEGORY_CD) AS RD_CATEGORY_NM, RD_THEME, ITEM_NAME, NICKNAME, '*********' AS NICKNAME_EXCL_HIDDEN, NICKNAME_EXCL, RD_CATEGORY_CD, APPLICATION, OWNER_COMPANY_CD, OWNER_ORG_CD, PID_STATUS_CD, RD_CATEGORY_CD, REGIST_ORG_CD, REGIST_USER_ID, REGIST_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_TIME FROM HP1DM01T WHERE PID=#PID#
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM HP1D001T WHERE 1 = 1 AND PID = #PID#
SELECT VAL2 AS REQUIRED_RETURN_NM FROM HP1M105T WHERE 1=1 AND CD = #CD# AND CD_TYPE ='RD_CATEGORY_CD'
SELECT PID, DCP_TYPE FROM HP1D001T WHERE 1 = 1 AND PID = #PID#

SELECT MAX((SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='10' AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='20'AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM1 ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='30'AND PID=#PID#))AS FILE_NM2 ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='40'AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM3 ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='50'AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM4 ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='60'AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM5 ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='70'AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM6 ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='71'AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM7 ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='72'AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM8 FROM HP1D002T WHERE 1=1 AND PID=#PID#

SELECT PID, DCP_TYPE, (SELECT VAL2 FROM HP1M105T WHERE 1=1 AND CD = #CD# AND CD_TYPE ='RD_CATEGORY_CD') AS REQUIRED_RETURN_NM, #CODE# AS REQUIRED_RETURN , CLOSING_AMT, REQUEST_AMT, CLOSING_COMPANY_CD||( SELECT ORG_CD FROM HP1DM03T WHERE ORG_SEQ LIKE (SELECT SUBSTR (ORG_SEQ,0, 4 ) FROM HP1DM03T AZ WHERE AZ.COMPANY_CD = CLOSING_COMPANY_CD AND AZ.ORG_CD = CLOSING_ORG_CD)|| '000000' AND COMPANY_CD=CLOSING_COMPANY_CD ) AS CLOSING_COMPANY_CD, CLOSING_ORG_CD, APPLICA_COMPANY_CD||( SELECT ORG_CD FROM HP1DM03T WHERE ORG_SEQ LIKE (SELECT SUBSTR (ORG_SEQ,0, 4 ) FROM HP1DM03T AZ WHERE AZ.COMPANY_CD = CLOSING_COMPANY_CD AND AZ.ORG_CD = APPLICA_ORG_CD)|| '000000' AND COMPANY_CD=CLOSING_COMPANY_CD ) AS APPLICA_COMPANY_CD , APPLICA_ORG_CD, RESPONS_COMPANY_CD, RESPONS_ORG_CD, PERSON_IN_CHARGE_ID, BTM_AMT_ECP_UNIT, BTM_AMT_ECP, BTM_AMT_SSP_UNIT, BTM_AMT_SSP, BTM_AMT_TP_UNIT, BTM_AMT_TP, OSC_MARGIN_RATIO, A_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, P_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, T_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, M_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, E_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, A_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, P_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, T_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, M_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, E_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, A_DCP_EXEC_CNT, P_DCP_EXEC_CNT, T_DCP_EXEC_CNT, M_DCP_EXEC_CNT, E_DCP_EXEC_CNT, REGIST_USER_ID, REGIST_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_TIME FROM HP1D001T WHERE 1 = 1 AND PID = #PID#
SELECT LENGTH(#FILE_NAME#) AS FILE_LENGTH FROM DUAL
sqlMap.update: Update HP_DBA01.HP1D002T set FILE_NAME=#FILE_NAME# , APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD=#APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD# , DCP_TYPE=#DCP_TYPE# , FILE_BIN=#FILE_BIN:BLOB# where PID=#PID# and SEQ=#SEQ#
sqlMap.insert: Insert into HP_DBA01.HP1D002T (FILE_NAME, APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD, PID, DCP_TYPE, SEQ, FILE_BIN) values(#FILE_NAME# , #APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD# , #PID# , #DCP_TYPE# , #SEQ# , #FILE_BIN:BLOB# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT MAX((SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='10' AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='20'AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM1 ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='30'AND PID=#PID#))AS FILE_NM2 ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='40'AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM3 ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='50'AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM4 ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='60'AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM5 ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='70'AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM6 ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='71'AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM7 ,MAX( (SELECT FILE_NAME FROM HP1D002T WHERE SEQ='72'AND PID=#PID#)) AS FILE_NM8 FROM HP1D002T WHERE 1=1 AND PID=#PID#

sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM( SELECT Y.USER_ID, X.ORG_LVL_4 FROM ( SELECT COMPANY_CD, ORG_CD, SUBSTR (ORG_SEQ, 0, 8) || '00' AS ORG_LVL_4 FROM HP1DM03T WHERE COMPANY_CD || ORG_CD = (SELECT OWNER_COMPANY_CD||OWNER_ORG_CD FROM HP1DM01T WHERE PID = #PID# ) ) X , ( SELECT A.USER_ID, B.COMPANY_CD, B.ORG_CD, SUBSTR(B.ORG_SEQ, 0,8)||'00' AS ORG_LVL_4 FROM US0M001T_V01 A, HP1DM03T B WHERE A.USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND A.COMPANY_INFO_CODE = B.COMPANY_CD AND A.OFFICE_CODE = B.ORG_CD ) Y WHERE X.ORG_LVL_4 = Y.ORG_LVL_4)
SELECT '0' AS CNT FROM DUAL
SELECT DCP_TYPE FROM HP1D001T WHERE PID=#PID#

SELECT ROUND(VAL_1,5) AS SALES_AMT , ROUND(VAL_2,5) AS NRE_AMT , ROUND(VAL_3,5) AS RD_COST , ROUND((VAL_1 - VAL_4 -VAL_3 -VAL_5),5) AS INCOME_AMT , ROUND(DECODE(VAL_1, 0, 0, ((VAL_1 - VAL_4 -VAL_3 -VAL_5)/VAL_1 )),5) AS INCOME_AMT_RATIO FROM ( SELECT NVL(MAX(DECODE(HPMS_ID , 'H10015',SUM(VAL))),0) AS VAL_1 ,NVL(MAX(DECODE(HPMS_ID , 'H10011',SUM(VAL))),0) AS VAL_2 ,NVL(MAX(DECODE(HPMS_ID , 'H30042',SUM(VAL))),0) AS VAL_3 ,NVL(MAX(DECODE(HPMS_ID , 'H20010',SUM(VAL))),0) AS VAL_4 ,NVL(MAX(DECODE(HPMS_ID , 'H30049',SUM(VAL))),0) AS VAL_5 FROM HP2D101T WHERE 1=1 AND HPMS_ID IN ('H10015','H10011','H30042','H20010' ,'H30049') AND DATA_TYPE=#DATA_TYPE# AND PID= #PID# GROUP BY HPMS_ID )
sqlMap.update: Update HP_DBA01.HP1D001T set INCOME_AMT_RATIO=#INCOME_AMT_RATIO# , T_DCP_EXEC_CNT=#T_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , T_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD=#T_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , T_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD=#T_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , A_DCP_EXEC_CNT=#A_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , RESPONS_ORG_CD=#RESPONS_ORG_CD# , CLOSING_AMT=#CLOSING_AMT# , A_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD=#A_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , DCP_TYPE=#DCP_TYPE# , PERSON_IN_CHARGE_ID=#PERSON_IN_CHARGE_ID# , BTM_AMT_ECP=#BTM_AMT_ECP# , BTM_AMT_ECP_UNIT=#BTM_AMT_ECP_UNIT# , REQUEST_AMT=#REQUEST_AMT# , OSC_MARGIN_RATIO=#OSC_MARGIN_RATIO# , NRE_AMT=#NRE_AMT# , E_DCP_EXEC_CNT=#E_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , M_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD=#M_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , RD_COST=#RD_COST# , E_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD=#E_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , E_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD=#E_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , INCOME_AMT=#INCOME_AMT# , RESPONS_COMPANY_CD=#RESPONS_COMPANY_CD# , P_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD=#P_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , BTM_AMT_SSP=#BTM_AMT_SSP# , M_DCP_EXEC_CNT=#M_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , APPLICA_COMPANY_CD=#APPLICA_COMPANY_CD# , CLOSING_ORG_CD=#CLOSING_ORG_CD# , BTM_AMT_TP=#BTM_AMT_TP# , M_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD=#M_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , APPLICA_ORG_CD=#APPLICA_ORG_CD# , REQUIRED_RETURN=#REQUIRED_RETURN# , CLOSING_COMPANY_CD=#CLOSING_COMPANY_CD# , UPDATE_TIME=SYSDATE , BTM_AMT_SSP_UNIT=#BTM_AMT_SSP_UNIT# , P_DCP_EXEC_CNT=#P_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , A_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD=#A_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , UPDATE_USER_ID=#UPDATE_USER_ID# , SALES_AMT=#SALES_AMT# , BTM_AMT_TP_UNIT=#BTM_AMT_TP_UNIT# , P_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD=#P_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# where PID=#PID#
sqlMap.insert: Insert into HP_DBA01.HP1D001T (INCOME_AMT_RATIO, T_DCP_EXEC_CNT, T_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, T_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, A_DCP_EXEC_CNT, RESPONS_ORG_CD, CLOSING_AMT, PID, A_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, DCP_TYPE, PERSON_IN_CHARGE_ID, BTM_AMT_ECP, BTM_AMT_ECP_UNIT, REQUEST_AMT, OSC_MARGIN_RATIO, NRE_AMT, E_DCP_EXEC_CNT, REGIST_USER_ID, M_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, RD_COST, E_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, E_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, INCOME_AMT, RESPONS_COMPANY_CD, P_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, BTM_AMT_SSP, M_DCP_EXEC_CNT, APPLICA_COMPANY_CD, CLOSING_ORG_CD, BTM_AMT_TP, M_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, APPLICA_ORG_CD, REQUIRED_RETURN, CLOSING_COMPANY_CD, BTM_AMT_SSP_UNIT, P_DCP_EXEC_CNT, REGIST_TIME, A_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, SALES_AMT, BTM_AMT_TP_UNIT, P_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD) values(#INCOME_AMT_RATIO# , #T_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , #T_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , #T_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , #A_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , #RESPONS_ORG_CD# , #CLOSING_AMT# , #PID# , #A_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , #DCP_TYPE# , #PERSON_IN_CHARGE_ID# , #BTM_AMT_ECP# , #BTM_AMT_ECP_UNIT# , #REQUEST_AMT# , #OSC_MARGIN_RATIO# , #NRE_AMT# , #E_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , #REGIST_USER_ID# , #M_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , #RD_COST# , #E_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , #E_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , #INCOME_AMT# , #RESPONS_COMPANY_CD# , #P_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , #BTM_AMT_SSP# , #M_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , #APPLICA_COMPANY_CD# , #CLOSING_ORG_CD# , #BTM_AMT_TP# , #M_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , #APPLICA_ORG_CD# , #REQUIRED_RETURN# , #CLOSING_COMPANY_CD# , #BTM_AMT_SSP_UNIT# , #P_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , SYSDATE, #A_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , #SALES_AMT# , #BTM_AMT_TP_UNIT# , #P_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# )
sqlMap.delete: Delete from HP_DBA01.HP1D002T where PID=#PID# and DCP_TYPE=#DCP_TYPE#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ROUND(VAL_1,5) AS SALES_AMT , ROUND(VAL_2,5) AS NRE_AMT , ROUND(VAL_3,5) AS RD_COST , ROUND((VAL_1 - VAL_4 -VAL_3 -VAL_5),5) AS INCOME_AMT , ROUND(DECODE(VAL_1, 0, 0, ((VAL_1 - VAL_4 -VAL_3 -VAL_5)/VAL_1 )),5) AS INCOME_AMT_RATIO FROM ( SELECT NVL(MAX(DECODE(HPMS_ID , 'H10015',SUM(VAL))),0) AS VAL_1 ,NVL(MAX(DECODE(HPMS_ID , 'H10011',SUM(VAL))),0) AS VAL_2 ,NVL(MAX(DECODE(HPMS_ID , 'H30042',SUM(VAL))),0) AS VAL_3 ,NVL(MAX(DECODE(HPMS_ID , 'H20010',SUM(VAL))),0) AS VAL_4 ,NVL(MAX(DECODE(HPMS_ID , 'H30049',SUM(VAL))),0) AS VAL_5 FROM HP2D101T WHERE 1=1 AND HPMS_ID IN ('H10015','H10011','H30042','H20010' ,'H30049') AND DATA_TYPE=#DATA_TYPE# AND PID= #PID# GROUP BY HPMS_ID )

SELECT SALES_AMT, NRE_AMT, RD_COST, INCOME_AMT, INCOME_AMT_RATIO FROM HP1D001T_TZ WHERE 1=1 AND PID=#PID# AND DCP_TYPE =#DCP_TYPE# AND APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD = ( SELECT MAX(APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD) as APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD FROM HP1D001T_TZ WHERE (1=1) AND PID=#PID# AND DCP_TYPE =#DCP_TYPE#)
SELECT SUBSTR(ORG_SEQ, 0,4) ORG_SEQ FROM HP1DM03T WHERE COMPANY_CD = #COMPANY_CD# AND ORG_CD=#ORG_CD#
SELECT ORG_CD ITEM_CD, ORG_NM_S ITEM_NM FROM HP1DM03T WHERE ORG_SEQ LIKE #ORG_SEQ# || '%' AND ORG_LVL != 2 AND ORG_LVL != 3 AND ACTIVE_FLAG= 0 ORDER BY ORG_SEQ

SELECT PID, DCP_TYPE, REQUIRED_RETURN, CLOSING_AMT, REQUEST_AMT, CLOSING_COMPANY_CD, CLOSING_ORG_CD, APPLICA_COMPANY_CD, APPLICA_ORG_CD, RESPONS_COMPANY_CD, RESPONS_ORG_CD, PERSON_IN_CHARGE_ID, BTM_AMT_ECP_UNIT, BTM_AMT_ECP, BTM_AMT_SSP_UNIT, BTM_AMT_SSP, BTM_AMT_TP_UNIT, BTM_AMT_TP, OSC_MARGIN_RATIO, A_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, P_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, T_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, M_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, E_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, A_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, P_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, T_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, M_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, E_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, A_DCP_EXEC_CNT, P_DCP_EXEC_CNT, T_DCP_EXEC_CNT, M_DCP_EXEC_CNT, E_DCP_EXEC_CNT, SALES_AMT, NRE_AMT, RD_COST, INCOME_AMT, INCOME_AMT_RATIO, REGIST_USER_ID, REGIST_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_TIME FROM HP1D001T WHERE PID=#PID#
sqlMap.update: Update HP_DBA01.HP1D001T_TZ set INCOME_AMT_RATIO=#INCOME_AMT_RATIO# , T_DCP_EXEC_CNT=#T_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , T_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD=#T_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , T_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD=#T_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , A_DCP_EXEC_CNT=#A_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , CLOSING_AMT=#CLOSING_AMT# , RESPONS_ORG_CD=#RESPONS_ORG_CD# , A_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD=#A_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , PID_STATUS_CD=#PID_STATUS_CD# , RD_THEME=#RD_THEME# , PERSON_IN_CHARGE_ID=#PERSON_IN_CHARGE_ID# , BTM_AMT_ECP=#BTM_AMT_ECP# , NICKNAME=#NICKNAME# , BTM_AMT_ECP_UNIT=#BTM_AMT_ECP_UNIT# , OSC_MARGIN_RATIO=#OSC_MARGIN_RATIO# , REQUEST_AMT=#REQUEST_AMT# , NRE_AMT=#NRE_AMT# , E_DCP_EXEC_CNT=#E_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , M_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD=#M_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , RD_COST=#RD_COST# , E_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD=#E_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , E_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD=#E_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , INCOME_AMT=#INCOME_AMT# , RESPONS_COMPANY_CD=#RESPONS_COMPANY_CD# , P_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD=#P_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , BTM_AMT_SSP=#BTM_AMT_SSP# , M_DCP_EXEC_CNT=#M_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , BTM_AMT_TP=#BTM_AMT_TP# , CLOSING_ORG_CD=#CLOSING_ORG_CD# , APPLICA_COMPANY_CD=#APPLICA_COMPANY_CD# , M_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD=#M_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , APPLICA_ORG_CD=#APPLICA_ORG_CD# , REQUIRED_RETURN=#REQUIRED_RETURN# , CLOSING_COMPANY_CD=#CLOSING_COMPANY_CD# , UPDATE_TIME=SYSDATE , BTM_AMT_SSP_UNIT=#BTM_AMT_SSP_UNIT# , P_DCP_EXEC_CNT=#P_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , RD_CATEGORY_CD=#RD_CATEGORY_CD# , A_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD=#A_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , UPDATE_USER_ID=#UPDATE_USER_ID# , SALES_AMT=#SALES_AMT# , ITEM_NAME=#ITEM_NAME# , BTM_AMT_TP_UNIT=#BTM_AMT_TP_UNIT# , P_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD=#P_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , NICKNAME_EXCL=#NICKNAME_EXCL# where PID=#PID# and DCP_TYPE=#DCP_TYPE# and APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD=#APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD#
sqlMap.insert: Insert into HP_DBA01.HP1D001T_TZ (INCOME_AMT_RATIO, T_DCP_EXEC_CNT, T_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, T_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, A_DCP_EXEC_CNT, CLOSING_AMT, PID, RESPONS_ORG_CD, A_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, DCP_TYPE, PID_STATUS_CD, RD_THEME, PERSON_IN_CHARGE_ID, BTM_AMT_ECP, NICKNAME, BTM_AMT_ECP_UNIT, OSC_MARGIN_RATIO, REQUEST_AMT, NRE_AMT, E_DCP_EXEC_CNT, REGIST_USER_ID, M_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, RD_COST, E_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, E_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, INCOME_AMT, RESPONS_COMPANY_CD, P_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, BTM_AMT_SSP, M_DCP_EXEC_CNT, BTM_AMT_TP, CLOSING_ORG_CD, APPLICA_COMPANY_CD, M_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD, APPLICA_ORG_CD, REQUIRED_RETURN, CLOSING_COMPANY_CD, BTM_AMT_SSP_UNIT, P_DCP_EXEC_CNT, APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD, REGIST_TIME, RD_CATEGORY_CD, A_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, SALES_AMT, ITEM_NAME, BTM_AMT_TP_UNIT, P_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD, NICKNAME_EXCL) values(#INCOME_AMT_RATIO# , #T_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , #T_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , #T_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , #A_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , #CLOSING_AMT# , #PID# , #RESPONS_ORG_CD# , #A_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , #DCP_TYPE# , #PID_STATUS_CD# , #RD_THEME# , #PERSON_IN_CHARGE_ID# , #BTM_AMT_ECP# , #NICKNAME# , #BTM_AMT_ECP_UNIT# , #OSC_MARGIN_RATIO# , #REQUEST_AMT# , #NRE_AMT# , #E_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , #REGIST_USER_ID# , #M_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , #RD_COST# , #E_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , #E_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , #INCOME_AMT# , #RESPONS_COMPANY_CD# , #P_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , #BTM_AMT_SSP# , #M_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , #BTM_AMT_TP# , #CLOSING_ORG_CD# , #APPLICA_COMPANY_CD# , #M_DCP_PLAN_YYYYMMDD# , #APPLICA_ORG_CD# , #REQUIRED_RETURN# , #CLOSING_COMPANY_CD# , #BTM_AMT_SSP_UNIT# , #P_DCP_EXEC_CNT# , #APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD# , SYSDATE, #RD_CATEGORY_CD# , #A_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , #SALES_AMT# , #ITEM_NAME# , #BTM_AMT_TP_UNIT# , #P_DCP_EXEC_YYYYMMDD# , #NICKNAME_EXCL# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT count(*) as cnt , PID ,SEQ ,DCP_TYPE FROM HP1D002T WHERE PID=#PID# GROUP BY PID ,SEQ,DCP_TYPE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM HP1D002T_TZ WHERE PID=#PID# AND SEQ = #SEQ# AND DCP_TYPE = #DCP_TYPE#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE HP1D002T_TZ SET (APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD, FILE_NAME, FILE_BIN )= (SELECT #APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD#, FILE_NAME, FILE_BIN FROM HP1D002T WHERE PID=#PID# AND DCP_TYPE=#DCP_TYPE# AND SEQ = #SEQ#) WHERE PID=#PID# AND DCP_TYPE=#DCP_TYPE# AND SEQ = #SEQ#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO HP1D002T_TZ (PID, DCP_TYPE, APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD, SEQ,FILE_NAME, FILE_BIN ) SELECT PID, DCP_TYPE, #APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD#, SEQ, FILE_NAME, FILE_BIN FROM HP1D002T WHERE PID=#PID# AND DCP_TYPE=#DCP_TYPE# AND SEQ = #SEQ#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.DATA_TYPE, A.PID, A.USE_COMPANY_CD, A.USE_ORG_CD, A.REQ_COMPANY_CD, A.REQ_ORG_CD, A.SRC_COMPANY_CD, A.SRC_ORG_CD, A.DST_COMPANY_CD, A.DST_ORG_CD, A.HPMS_ID, A.INVEST_TYPE_CD, A.APPLICATION, A.ITEM_NAME, A.CUSTOMER_CD, A.YYYYMM, A.UNIT, A.VAL, A.UNIT2, A.VAL2, A.UNIT3, A.VAL3, A.VAL_TYPE, A.UPDATE_TIME, A.UPDATE_USER_ID, A.UPLOAD_FILE_NAME, A.CALC_MST_VER FROM HP2D002T A where 1=1 AND (PID=#PID# OR PID IN (SELECT SUB_PID FROM HP1DM02T WHERE PID = #PID#) )
sqlMap.insert: Insert into HP_DBA01.HP2D002T_TZ (VAL2, VAL3, PID, UNIT2, UNIT3, APPLICATION, VAL_TYPE, DST_ORG_CD, DST_COMPANY_CD, YYYYMM, CALC_MST_VER, SRC_COMPANY_CD, DATA_TYPE, UPLOAD_FILE_NAME, USE_COMPANY_CD, CUSTOMER_CD, UNIT, HPMS_ID, UPDATE_TIME, APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD, INVEST_TYPE_CD, VAL, SRC_ORG_CD, UPDATE_USER_ID, REQ_ORG_CD, ITEM_NAME, REQ_COMPANY_CD, USE_ORG_CD) values(#VAL2# , #VAL3# , #PID# , #UNIT2# , #UNIT3# , #APPLICATION# , #VAL_TYPE# , #DST_ORG_CD# , #DST_COMPANY_CD# , #YYYYMM# , #CALC_MST_VER# , #SRC_COMPANY_CD# , #DATA_TYPE# , #UPLOAD_FILE_NAME# , #USE_COMPANY_CD# , #CUSTOMER_CD# , #UNIT# , #HPMS_ID# , SYSDATE, #APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD# , #INVEST_TYPE_CD# , #VAL# , #SRC_ORG_CD# , #UPDATE_USER_ID# , #REQ_ORG_CD# , #ITEM_NAME# , #REQ_COMPANY_CD# , #USE_ORG_CD# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT PID, DCP_TYPE, APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD, SEQ, FILE_NAME, FILE_BIN , #FILE_PATH# FILE_PATH FROM HP1D002T WHERE PID = #PID# AND DCP_TYPE = #DCP_TYPE# AND SEQ = #SEQ#
SELECT PID, DCP_TYPE, APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD, SEQ, FILE_NAME, FILE_BIN , #FILE_PATH# FILE_PATH FROM HP1D002T WHERE PID = #PID# AND DCP_TYPE = #DCP_TYPE# AND SEQ = #SEQ#
